cards.name: Karn Liberated
cards.originalText:
+4 : Le joueur ciblé exile une carte de sa main.
-3 : Exilez le permanent ciblé.
-14 : Recommencez la partie en laissant en exil toutes les cartes de permanent non-aura exilées avec Karn libéré. Puis mettez ces cartes sur le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle.
cards.text:
+4: Target player exiles a card from his or her hand.
−3: Exile target permanent.
−14: Restart the game, leaving in exile all non-Aura permanent cards exiled with Karn Liberated. Then put those cards onto the battlefield under your control.

• Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.text: Untap all artifacts you control during each other player's untap step.

cards.flavor:
